citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:10 on
12-Jul-17.
ACI Bartels arrived at the facility. The licensee met ACI Bartels at the door to the residence/office. The licensee
stated they were not available for inspection due to meetings.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:10 on
12-Jul-17.
ACI Bartels arrived at the facility.  The licensee met ACI Bartels at the door to the residence/office.  The licensee
stated they were not available for inspection due to meetings.
